attributes.name: hcp
attributes.description: HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) is HashiCorp's first-party platform for hosting our products as managed services. HCP includes shared platform functionality like login, access control, and billing, and can be managed via web portal interface or Terraform provider. It primarily serves to enable easily launching and running services like Consul and Vault, which will be deployed into HashiCorp Virtual Networks (HVNs) and connected to your infrastructure resources.
